typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'bronze',
	folderPath: 'FourthCoffee/Rentals',
	fileName: 'Customers.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> Customers
source(output(
		CustomerSK as long,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date,
		DataSourceId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'silver',
	folderPath: 'Customers') ~> CustomersSilver
Customers derive(NewPhoneNumber = toString(PhoneNumber),
		DataSourceId = 3,
		AddressId = uuid(),
		NewZipCode = toString(ZipCode)) ~> AddDataSourceId
CustomersSilver aggregate(MaxCustoemrSK = max(CustomerSK)) ~> Aggregate1
AddDataSourceId select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		PhoneNumber = NewPhoneNumber,
		DataSourceId,
		AddressId,
		ZipCode = NewZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Aggregate1, Select1 join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(CustomerSK = MaxCustoemrSK+1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'silver',
	folderPath: 'Customers',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerSink
AddDataSourceId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'silver',
	folderPath: 'Addresses',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		AddressID = AddressId,
		CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode = NewZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		DataSourceId
	)) ~> AddressesSink
